resources.string: One minute to type as many words as you can.
You choose how many words you want to type. We keep track of the time.
View the best times of you and your friends.
Practice letters that you have trouble typing with. No time is recorded.

Welcome to our game! Type the words that will randomly appear as fast as you can. To submit your word, press the space bar. To skip a word, double tap the space bar. (Skipped words will count as an error towards your score review)
We have detected that you are not connected to the internet. This app requires a stable internet connection at all times. Please come back when you are connected!
